$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse, Sharena...I would like to ask
your advice. Of course I'd like your
input too, $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|How can we help, Commander Anna?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|I've heard word that an incredibly
powerful foe appeared in another
world, and they seek our aid.$k$pThe threat is too great for the
Heroes of their world to face
on their own.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh! They're in trouble, so they ask
for help from another world...$k$p$EFace_Smile|Just like we do!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Normal2|You have a point there. We have
brought the Heroes helping us here
to join us from other worlds...$k$pNow it's time for us to help them
in return!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|I'm glad to hear you support the idea.
However, the situation is a bit more
complicated than that...$k$p$EFace_Anger|Under the circumstances, we can't
all rush into battle.$k$pOur ability to help is limited
to sending reinforcements.$k$pSo, we have to send support forces
out to the four Heroes who have
already engaged the enemy.$k$pOur foe is a general with a vast army
under their command.$k$p$EFace_Pain2|We don't know the exact numbers,
just that they are an overwhelming
force to face.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Facing such numbers, will our
reinforcements be enough?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|That is another complication. The call
for aid is being heard by the Orders
of Heroes from many other worlds.$k$p$EFace_Smile|And the support forces they send
are rallying behind the four Heroes
on the ground there.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Even Orders of Heroes from other
worlds are joining in to help, then!
That's a comforting thought!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|The support forces being deployed
are outfitted with Guardian Shields,
which can be crucial defense.$k$pThe Guardian Shield can be used
for protection, but it can be used
only up to three times per battle.$k$pTiming use of Guardian Shields will
be critical to success.$k$p$EFace_Pain2|If many Guardian Shields are used
by the support forces at once...$k$p$EFace_Cool|A power that will protect the
entire army will be unleashed—
the Skjaldborg shield wall!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Wow! That sounds amazing! I want
to see it for myself!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|The more support we send, the
deeper into the enemy's forces
our Heroes can cut.$k$pBut the more our forces extend
themselves, the greater the danger
of the enemy turning the tables.$k$pWe will have to consider our choices
carefully... So, in that case, it's in
your hands, $Nu!$k$p$EFace_Smile|We're counting on you!$k$p
